heading: Today
text: Locally dense fog through the river valleys burning off by mid-morning.  Sunny and a bit warmer.  Highs in the 70s, close to 80 in the warmer valleys.  Light winds.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear north this evening, then increasing high clouds from south to north. Not as cool.  Areas of dense river valley fog.  Lows in the mid 40s to mid 50s, coolest northeast, mildest near Lake Champlain.  Winds light and variable, becoming south up to 10 mph near Lake Champlain.

heading: Wednesday
text: Patches of fog through the river valleys early.  High clouds and limited sun north, and mostly cloudy south.  A few degrees cooler.  Highs in the 70s, close to 80 far north.  Light winds, except south 5 to 10 mph near Lake Champlain, becoming light.
